text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Beaver Dam, Wisconsin | settlement_type = City | image_skyline = BeaverDamWisconsinDowntownWIS33.jpg | imagesize = 325px | image_caption = Looking east at downtown Beaver Dam | image_map = File:Dodge County Wisconsin Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Beaver Dam Highlighted.svg | map_caption = Location of Beaver Dam in Dodge County, Wisconsin | image_flag = Flag of Beaver Dam (Wisconsin).jpg | pushpin_map = Wisconsin#USA | pushpin_map_caption = Location of Beaver Dam in Wisconsin | pushpin_label = Beaver Dam | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = United States of America | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Wisconsin | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = Dodge County | government_type = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = | established_title = Settled | established_date = 1852 | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 22.52 | area_land_km2 = 18.94 | area_water_km2 = 3.59 | area_total_sq_mi = 8.70 | area_land_sq_mi = 7.31 | area_water_sq_mi = 1.38 | area_water_percent = 16.89 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_ft = 879 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 16708 | population_density_sq_mi = 2284.7 | population_density_km2 = 882.1 | population_note = | timezone1 = Central | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | coordinates = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 53916 | area_code = 920 | website = | footnotes = | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 55-05900 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1561457 }} Beaver Dam is a city in Dodge County, Wisconsin, United States, along Beaver Dam Lake and the Beaver Dam River. The population was 16,708 at the 2020 census, making it the largest city in Dodge County. ==References== Category:Cities in Wisconsin Category:Dodge County, Wisconsin
title: Beaver Dam, Wisconsin
